programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.sub-title: What to Cook When There's Nothing in the Pantry
programme.desc: What can you cook when there's nothing in the pantry? Emeril shares recipes that require minimal ingredients: vegetable frittata, easy fettuccine with bacon and peas, and roasted garlic soup.

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Make delicious Asian dishes with Emeril's recipes: chicken and veggie stir-fry with cellophane noodles, beef and soba noodle stir-fry, and cold-noodle salad with honey-sesame dressing and peanuts

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril shows you how easy it is to make fresh pasta at home. Cheese ravioli with a rich sage butter sauce; gluten-free pasta with pancetta and marinara sauce

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: If you're searching for a satisfying, no-fuss dinner, look no further than Emeril's one-pot wonder, coq au vin blanc. Plus, French classic leek and bacon quiche

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Embrace autumn with Emeril's sweet and savory apple recipes: apple cider-braised chicken with cabbage and homemade applesauce and warm apple fritters

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril hosts a group of "recipe rut" moms. Classic balsamic vinaigrette, grilled shrimp with creamy avocado-lime vinaigrette, and fresh tomato vinaigrette

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.sub-title: Coffee: Sneaky Flavor Enhancer in Savory Dishes
programme.desc: Emeril prepares coffee-infused recipes: short ribs, ancho chiles with Parmesan polenta, and espresso and cocoa-rubbed flank steak with blood orange and plum salad

programme.title: Emeril's Table
programme.desc: Emeril shares his savory wild mushroom ragout over creamy stone-ground grits. Plus, Emeril's rich and delicious porcini risotto with truffle oil

programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Scott Maurer in the kitchen as Emeril builds an entire meal around Louisiana oysters.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and jazz legend Kermit Ruffins in his New Orleans kitchen as he prepares Red Bean Soup with Cornbread Croutons and Shrimp Stuffed Mirlitons with a classic Vodka Sauce.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Janie Glade in his kitchen as he creates a delicious and economical meal that makes good use of pantry staples.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his friend Sarah Roland in the kitchen as they create dishes using ingredients from her water buffalo dairy farm.

programme.title: Emeril Cooks
